name: spindle cell sarcoma
definition: A sarcoma that results_in cells that are spindle-shaped. They are usually resistant to radiation therapy. [url:http\://medical-dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/spindle+cell+sarcoma]

clinicalTrials.title: A Randomized Trial of Pembrolizumab & Radiotherapy Versus Radiotherapy in High-Risk Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Extremity (SU2C-SARC032)
Doxorubicin Plus Dual Checkpoint Blockade for Soft Tissue Sarcomas
